An update should enhance the game, not shut it down.  FIX It!!Its now June 8.  There  were two updates in May that did not address the problem of the app opening on a Kindle Fire.  FIX THIS PROBLEM!

column8: I thought this game was really fun at first...but when I got to the higher level puzzles, which are much harder to complete, I discovered after failing several times at the harder puzzle, I would be locked out of the game for over 20 minutes or more at a time because I had run out of lives!  Those greedy buggers were going to make me wait another 20-25 minutes before I could play again...UNLESS I wanted to pay for the privilege of getting extra lives right away.They also have various booster candies you can buy to help you play longer too.  If you don't mind feeling manipulated by the game developers and have lot's of cash lying around, then maybe you'll enjoy playing this game.  I would rather pay 1 purchase price upfront for the game than constantly be hounded for money and nickel & dimed to death.  It gets really old very quickly!  ><

column3: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2014
column8: I like match 3 type games and this one has consistently entertained me.  It has a nice mix of difficult and easy levels all throughout the game. I also like the free boosters that are given every so often.  For someone who tends to spend too much time playing games, this has a self-limiting feature in that you only get five lives at a time.  Overall, a fun experience.
column9: just the right amount of challenge
